oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Information sources: Overview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Willer, Helga
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Country reports
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this chapter, some of the major information sources for information related to organic farming are presented. The International Trade Centre (ITC) has recently considerably expanded its information and market access services. These are presented in detail.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements (IFOAM), Bonn, Germany and Research Institute of Organic Agriculture FiBL, Frick, Switzerland
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Willer, Helga (2007) Information sources: Overview. In: Willer, Helga and Yussefi, Minou (Eds.) The World of Organic Agriculture - Statistics and Emerging Trends 2007. International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements (IFOAM), Bonn, Germany and Research Institute of Organic Agriculture FiBL, Frick, Switzerland, chapter 6: Data and Market Access Information, pp. 45-49.
